name: Probar Protein Mint Chocolate Bar
description:
A bar that's packed with soy protein, yet tastes of chocolate with a hint of mint. And it serves up your omega 3 and 6s from chia and flax seeds.Ingredients: Soy protein isolate, organic tapioca syrup, organic agave syrup, organic dried cane syrup, fractionated palm kernel oil, glycerine, organic agave inulin, unsweetened chocolate, omega blend (flaxseed, chia seed), natural flavor, high oleic safflower oil, cocoa tapioca starch, organic soy protein concentrate, cocoa(process with alkali), salt, soy lecithin, gum Arabic, rosemary extract, tocopherols added to protect flavor, citric acid, ascorbic acid.

        Sustainability
